file_content.text: What is all this?
It's your first official speech as Alliance Commander.
I'll have to thank everyone for their vote of confidence.
I'm honored.
Enough standing around. Let's get this underway.
About time.
When was that decided without my having any say whatsoever?
I didn't agree to that role.
There was no vote. No meetings, no debates. It's simply the way it is. The way it has been since the day you arrived.
Everyone knows it. It's just... official now.
So I've been promoted from Commander to....
I thought you hated titles.
I hate having one, but I do love granting them.
They're looking to you to guide them to greatness as only you can. Take them there.
You began with nothing. Now you stand inside the base you have built. The Alliance grows stronger every day. You have done well.
[Give an oppressive speech]
All of us here, we know about loss, don't we? We've lost loved ones, friends. We've been beaten down time and again.
[Give an inspiring speech]
Our lives have been taken from us. It almost feels like our destiny. But not one of you has given up. You've stuck it out through your losses.
You've come together to build, to create, to fight--and I appreciate each and every one of you.
Working together, the galaxy won't have to live under the threat of a tyrant.
Together, we will remove Arcann from the throne and we will prevail!
They have come so far.
Indeed, they have.
They still have far to go, but at this rate they could one day pose a challenge to the Eternal Empire.
Perhaps. A pity so many of them will have to die....
It was never decided.
Yes, you have. Congratulations, Commander.
But make no mistake--your work has just begun. It's time to redouble your efforts. To sacrifice, and do as your superiors tell you without question.
When you grow tired, when you wish it would all end, I want you to think about the madman out there.
Arcann remains a threat to everything you have ever held dear.
Arcann is your enemy. Destroy him... or be destroyed.
